titles.title: Eliminate the Commission to Nowhere Act of 2018
To terminate the Denali Commission, and for other purposes.
Eliminate the Commission to Nowhere Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary:
Eliminate the Commission to Nowhere Act of 2018
This bill terminates the Denali Commission. The commission is an independent federal agency designed to provide critical utilities, infrastructure, and economic support throughout Alaska.
